title: Amexio Floating-Button
description: A Floating button component with various position options (vertical/horizontal/top/bottom/left/right)

gridData.name: vertical-position
gridData.description: top or bottom or center. This attribute is ignored if user specify position explicitly (using position-top/position-bottom/position-left/position-right)

gridData.name: horizontal-position
gridData.description: left or right or center. This attribute is ignored if user specify position explicitly (using position-top/position-bottom/position-left/position-right)

gridData.name: position-top
gridData.description: Takes top position in percentage or pixel

gridData.name: icon
gridData.description: Fa-icon class

gridData.name: position-bottom
gridData.description: Takes bottom position in percentage or pixel

gridData.name: position-left
gridData.description: Takes left position in percentage or pixel

gridData.name: position-right
gridData.description: Takes right position in percentage or pixel

gridData.name: label
gridData.description: Label on floating button, this is activated in case of block=square

gridData.name: block
gridData.description: Display button as round or square

gridData.name: type
gridData.description: Type of button - default / theme-color / theme-backgroundcolor / green / red / yellow

gridData.name: color
gridData.description: sets icon color

gridData.name: bg-color
gridData.description: sets background color of floating button.

gridData.name: disabled
gridData.description: Enable/Disables the button

gridData.name: relative
gridData.description: Place floating button at relative position

gridData.name: absolute
gridData.description: Place floating button at absolute position

gridData.name: size
gridData.description: Size for floating button (large, default, small)

gridData.name: tool-tip
gridData.description: Provides tooltip to the button

gridData.name: onClick
gridData.description: Event is fired when button is click

gridData.name: Tab
gridData.description: Navigates on Tab click to the next active element.

gridData.name: Enter
gridData.description: Toggles the floating button.
